345 /*LVDS feature is unverified code. Conflicts with data path processing and should not be used.*/
346 int32_t MmwDemo_setHsiClk(void)
347 {
348  rlDevHsiClk_t hsiClkgs;
349  int32_t retVal;
350 
351  /*************************************************************************************
352  * Setup the HSI Clock through the mmWave Link:
353  *************************************************************************************/
354  memset ((void*)&hsiClkgs, 0, sizeof(rlDevHsiClk_t));
355 
356  /* Setup the HSI Clock as per the Radar Interface Document:
357  * - This is set to 600Mhz DDR Mode */
358  hsiClkgs.hsiClk = 0x9;
359 
360  /* Setup the HSI in the radar link: */
361  retVal = rlDeviceSetHsiClk(RL_DEVICE_MAP_CASCADED_1, &hsiClkgs);
362  if (retVal != RL_RET_CODE_OK)
363  {
364  /* Error: Unable to set the HSI clock */
365  //System_printf ("Error: Setting up the HSI Clock Failed [Error %d]\n", retVal);
366  return -1;
367  }
368 
369  /* The delay below is needed only if the DCA1000EVM is being used to capture the data traces.
370  This is needed because the DCA1000EVM FPGA needs the delay to lock to the
371  bit clock before they can start capturing the data correctly. */
372  Task_sleep(HSI_DCA_MIN_DELAY_MSEC);
373 
374  return 0;
375 }
376 
385 static bool MmwDemo_doSensorOpen(void)
386 {
387  bool startStatus = true;
388  int32_t errCode;
389 
390  /* Open mmWave module, this is only done once */
391  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorOpened == false)
392  {
393  /* Get the open configuration: */
394  CLI_getMMWaveExtensionOpenConfig (&gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg);
395 
396  /* Setup the calibration frequency: */
397  gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.freqLimitLow = 760U;
398  gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.freqLimitHigh = 810U;
399 
400  /* start/stop async events */
401  gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.disableFrameStartAsyncEvent = false;
402  gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.disableFrameStopAsyncEvent = false;
403 
404  /* No custom calibration: */
405  gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.useCustomCalibration = false;
406  gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg.customCalibrationEnableMask = 0x0;
407 
408  /* Open the mmWave module: */
409  if (MMWave_open (gMmwMCB.ctrlHandle, &gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg, NULL, &errCode) < 0)
410  {
411  System_printf ("Error: mmWave Open failed %d\n", errCode);
412  /* Post event that start failed */
413  startStatus = false;
414  }
415  else
416  {
417  startStatus = true;
418 
419  /*Set up HSI clock*/
420  if(MmwDemo_setHsiClk() < 0)
421  {
422  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
423  }
424 
425  /* mmWave module has been opened. */
426  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorOpened = true;
427  }
428  }
429  else
430  {
431  /* openCfg related configurations like chCfg, lowPowerMode, adcCfg
432  * are only used on the first sensor start. If they are different
433  * on a subsequent sensor start, then generate a fatal error
434  * so the user does not think that the new (changed) configuration
435  * takes effect, the board needs to be reboot for the new
436  * configuration to be applied.
437  */
438  MMWave_OpenCfg openCfg;
439 
440  CLI_getMMWaveExtensionOpenConfig (&openCfg);
441 
442  /* initialize to same as in "if" part where open is done
443  * to allow memory compare of structures to be used.
444  * Note that even if structures may have holes, the memory
445  * compare is o.k because CLI always stores the configurations
446  * in the same global CLI structure which is copied over to the
447  * one supplied by the application through the
448  * CLI_getMMWaveExtensionOpenConfig API. Not using memcmp will
449  * require individual field comparisons which is probably
450  * more code size and cumbersome.
451  */
452  openCfg.freqLimitLow = 760U;
453  openCfg.freqLimitHigh = 810U;
454 
455  /* start/stop async events */
456  openCfg.disableFrameStartAsyncEvent = false;
457  openCfg.disableFrameStopAsyncEvent = false;
458 
459  /* Compare openCfg */
460  if(memcmp((void *)&gMmwMCB.cfg.openCfg, (void *)&openCfg,
461  sizeof(MMWave_OpenCfg)) != 0)
462  {
463  startStatus = false;
464  /* Post event that start failed */
465  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_FAILED_EVT);
466 
467  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
468  }
469  else
470  {
471  startStatus = true;
472  }
473  }
474 
475  return startStatus;
476 }
477 
488 static bool MmwDemo_doSensorStart(void)
489 {
490  bool startStatus = true;
491  int32_t errCode;
492 
493  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted == false)
494  {
495  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStartCount++;
496 
497  /* Get the configuration from the CLI mmWave Extension */
498  CLI_getMMWaveExtensionConfig (&gMmwMCB.cfg.ctrlCfg);
499 
500  /* Configure the mmWave module: */
501  if (MMWave_config (gMmwMCB.ctrlHandle, &gMmwMCB.cfg.ctrlCfg, &errCode) < 0)
502  {
503  MMWave_ErrorLevel errorLevel;
504  int16_t mmWaveErrorCode;
505  int16_t subsysErrorCode;
506 
507  /* Error: Report the error */
508  MMWave_decodeError (errCode, &errorLevel, &mmWaveErrorCode, &subsysErrorCode);
509 
510  System_printf ("Error: mmWave Config failed [Error code: %d Subsystem: %d]\n",
511  mmWaveErrorCode, subsysErrorCode);
512 
513  /* Post event that start failed */
514  startStatus = false;
515  }
516  else
517  {
518  /* Setup the data path: */
519  MmwDemo_dataPathConfig ();
520  if (MmwDemo_dataPathStart()==0)
521  {
522  /* The sensor has been started successfully. Switch on the LED */
523  GPIO_write (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_2, 1U);
524 
525  /* Sensor has been started successfully: */
526  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted = true;
527  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus = 0U;
528 
529  /* Post event that start is done */
530  startStatus = true;
531  }
532  else
533  {
534  /* Post event that start failed */
535  startStatus = false;
536  }
537  }
538  }
539  else
540  {
541  /* Not expected */
542  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
543  }
544 
545  return startStatus;
546 }
547 
558 static bool MmwDemo_doSensorFrameStart(void)
559 {
560  bool startStatus = true;
561 
562  /* These events trigger sensor start without re-config */
563  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted == false)
564  {
565  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStartCount++;
566  if (MmwDemo_dataPathStart()==0)
567  {
568  /* The sensor has been started successfully. Switch on the LED */
569  GPIO_write (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_2, 1U);
570 
571  /* Sensor has been started successfully: */
572  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted = true;
573  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus = 0U;
574 
575  /* Post event that start is done */
576  startStatus = true;
577  }
578  else
579  {
580  /* Post event that start failed */
581  startStatus = false;
582  }
583  }
584  else
585  {
586  /* Not expected */
587  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
588  }
589  return startStatus;
590 }
591 
601 static bool MmwDemo_doSensorStop(void)
602 {
603  bool stopStatus = true;
604  int32_t errCode;
605 
606  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted == true)
607  {
608  /* Stop the mmWave module: */
609  if (MMWave_stop (gMmwMCB.ctrlHandle, &errCode) < 0)
610  {
611  MMWave_ErrorLevel errorLevel;
612  int16_t mmWaveErrorCode;
613  int16_t subsysErrorCode;
614 
615  /* Error/Warning: Unable to stop the mmWave module */
616  MMWave_decodeError (errCode, &errorLevel, &mmWaveErrorCode, &subsysErrorCode);
617  if (errorLevel == MMWave_ErrorLevel_ERROR)
618  {
619  /* Error: Display the error message: */
620  System_printf ("Error: mmWave Stop failed [Error code: %d Subsystem: %d]\n",
621  mmWaveErrorCode, subsysErrorCode);
622 
623  /* Set the status of the stop. */
624  stopStatus = false;
625 
626  /* Not expected */
627  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
628  }
629  else
630  {
631  /* Warning: This is treated as a successful stop. */
632  System_printf ("mmWave Stop error ignored [Error code: %d Subsystem: %d]\n",
633  mmWaveErrorCode, subsysErrorCode);
634  stopStatus = true;
635  }
636  }
637  else
638  {
639  stopStatus = true;
640  }
641  }
642  else
643  {
644  /* Not expected */
645  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
646  }
647 
648  if(stopStatus == true)
649  {
650  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus |= MMWDEMO_CTRLPATH_STOP_STATUS;
651 
652  /* Sensor stopped, Notify data path to handle sensor stop */
653  MmwDemo_dataPathStop(&gMmwMCB.dataPathObj);
654  }
655 
656  return stopStatus;
657 }
658 
668 static void MmwDemo_finishSensorStop(void)
669 {
670  /* The sensor has been stopped successfully. Switch off the LED */
671  GPIO_write (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_2, 0U);
672 
673  /* Sensor has been stopped successfully: */
674  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted = false;
675 
676  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopCount++;
677 
678  /* print for user */
679  System_printf("Sensor has been stopped: start:%d stop%d\n",
680  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStartCount,gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopCount);
681 }
692 void MmwDemo_sensorStateInit(MmwDemo_SensorEvent event)
693 {
694  bool startStatus = true;
695 
696  switch(event)
697  {
698  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_START:
699 
700 
701  /* Sensor Open */
702  startStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorOpen();
703 
704  /* Sensor Start */
705  if (startStatus == true)
706  {
707  startStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorStart();
708  }
709 
710  /* Post events to CLI/key switch task with start results */
711  if(startStatus == true)
712  {
713  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_START;
714  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT);
715  }
716  else
717  {
718  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_FAILED_EVT);
719  /* mmwave open or start failed, remain in the INIT state */
720  }
721 
722  break;
723 
724  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_FRAME_START:
725  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT);
726  break;
727  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_STOP:
728  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_STOP_COMPLETED_EVT);
729  break;
730  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_KEY_PRESS:
731  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_BSS_STOP:
732  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_DATAPATH_STOP:
733  /* These events will be ignored in INIT state */
734  break;
735 
736  default:
737  /* Not expected */
738  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
739  break;
740  }
741 }
742 
753 void MmwDemo_sensorStateStart(MmwDemo_SensorEvent event)
754 {
755  bool stopStatus = true;
756 
757  switch(event)
758  {
759  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_STOP:
760  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_KEY_PRESS:
761 
762  /* These events trigger the stop process */
763  stopStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorStop();
764  if (stopStatus == true)
765  {
766  /* Change sensor state to wait for ALL Components stop done */
767  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_STOP_PENDING;
768  }
769  else
770  {
771  /* Sensor Stop error, do assertion */
772  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
773  }
774  break;
775 
776  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_START:
777  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_FRAME_START:
778  /* Ignore duplicate command */
779  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT);
780  break;
781 
782  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_BSS_STOP:
783  /* Finite frame loop configuration, BSS stop comes first */
784  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus |= MMWDEMO_BSS_STOP_STATUS;
785  if(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus == MMWDEMO_ALLCOMP_STOP_STATUS)
786  {
787  /* Not expected events */
788  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
789  }
790  else
791  {
792  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_STOP_PENDING;
793  }
794 
795  break;
796 
797  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_DATAPATH_STOP:
798  /* Not expected events */
799  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
800  break;
801 
802  default:
803  /* Not expected events */
804  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
805  break;
806  }
807 }
808 
819 void MmwDemo_sensorStateStopPending(MmwDemo_SensorEvent event)
820 {
821  bool stopStatus = true;
822  bool postEvent = false;
823 
824  switch(event)
825  {
826  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_STOP:
827  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_KEY_PRESS:
828  if(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus == 0)
829  {
830  /* Ignore duplicated events from CLI/key press */
831  }
832  else
833  {
834  /* For finite loop frame configuration, BSS done comes first, always waiting for sensor stop from CLI */
835 
836  /* Start sensor stop on control path */
837  stopStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorStop();
838  if (stopStatus == true)
839  {
840  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus |= MMWDEMO_CTRLPATH_STOP_STATUS;
841  if(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus == MMWDEMO_ALLCOMP_STOP_STATUS)
842  {
843  /* All componets stopped, move to STOP state */
844  MmwDemo_finishSensorStop();
845  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_STOP;
846  postEvent = true;
847  }
848  else
849  {
850  /* Stay in the same stae, waiting for data path event */
851  }
852  }
853  else
854  {
855  /* Not expected */
856  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
857  }
858  }
859  break;
860 
861  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_START:
862  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_FRAME_START:
863  /* This events can come for finite frame loop configuration, unblock CLI */
864  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT);
865  break;
866 
867  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_DATAPATH_STOP:
868  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus |= MMWDEMO_DATAPATH_STOP_STATUS;
869  if(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus == MMWDEMO_ALLCOMP_STOP_STATUS)
870  {
871  /* All componets stopped, move to STOP state */
872  MmwDemo_finishSensorStop();
873  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_STOP;
874  postEvent = true;
875  }
876  else
877  {
878  /* Stay in the same state, waiting for all componets stopped */
879  }
880  break;
881 
882  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_BSS_STOP:
883  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus |= MMWDEMO_BSS_STOP_STATUS;
884  if(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorStopStatus == MMWDEMO_ALLCOMP_STOP_STATUS)
885  {
886  /* All componets stopped, move to STOP state */
887  MmwDemo_finishSensorStop();
888  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_STOP;
889  postEvent = true;
890  }
891  else
892  {
893  /* Stay in the same state, waiting for all componets stopped */
894  }
895  break;
896 
897  default:
898  /* Not expected events */
899  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
900  break;
901  }
902 
903  /* Post CLI event if the request comes from CLI */
904  if ((postEvent == true) & (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.keyPressEvent == 0))
905  {
906  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_STOP_COMPLETED_EVT);
907  }
908 }
909 
920 void MmwDemo_sensorStateStop(MmwDemo_SensorEvent event)
921 {
922  bool startStatus = true;
923  bool postEvent = false;
924 
925  switch(event)
926  {
927  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_START:
928  /* These events trigger sensor start process */
929 
930  /* Sensor Open */
931  startStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorOpen();
932 
933  if(startStatus == true)
934  {
935  startStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorStart();
936  }
937  postEvent = true;
938 
939  if(startStatus == true)
940  {
941  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_START;
942  }
943  else
944  {
945  /* Start failed, remain in the same state */
946  }
947  break;
948 
949  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_KEY_PRESS:
950  /* These events trigger sensor start without re-config */
951  postEvent = false;
952 
953  startStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorFrameStart();
954  if(startStatus == true)
955  {
956  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_START;
957  }
958  else
959  {
960  /* Start failed, remain in the same state */
961  }
962 
963  break;
964  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_FRAME_START:
965  /* These events trigger sensor start without re-config */
966  postEvent = true;
967 
968  startStatus = MmwDemo_doSensorFrameStart();
969  if(startStatus == true)
970  {
971  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_START;
972  }
973  else
974  {
975  /* Start failed, remain in the same state */
976  }
977  break;
978 
979  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_STOP:
980  /* Event should be ignored, post event to unblock CLI*/
981  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_STOP_COMPLETED_EVT);
982  break;
983 
984  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_BSS_STOP:
985  case MmwDemo_SensorEvent_DATAPATH_STOP:
986  /* Ignore these events in STOP state */
987  break;
988 
989  default:
990  /* Not expected events */
991  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
992  break;
993  }
994 
995  /* Post complete/fail event to CLI */
996  if ((postEvent == true) & (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.keyPressEvent == 0))
997  {
998  if(startStatus == true)
999  {
1000  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT);
1001  }
1002  else
1003  {
1004  /* Start failed, post fail event */
1005  Event_post(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify, MMWDEMO_START_FAILED_EVT);
1006  }
1007  }
1008 }
1009 
1013 MmwDemo_sensorSMFunc MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[MmwDemo_SensorState_MAX]=
1014 {
1015  MmwDemo_sensorStateInit,
1016  MmwDemo_sensorStateStart,
1017  MmwDemo_sensorStateStopPending,
1018  MmwDemo_sensorStateStop
1019 };
1020 
1033 static void MmwDemo_switchPressFxn(unsigned int index)
1034 {
1035  /* Post Key Press event to sensor management task */
1036  Event_post (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, MMWDEMO_KEY_PRESS_EVT);
1037 }
1047 static void MmwDemo_sensorMgmtTask (UArg arg0, UArg arg1)
1048 {
1049  UInt event;
1050 
1051  /* GPIO Input: Configure pin N7 as GPIO_1 input */
1052  Pinmux_Set_OverrideCtrl(SOC_XWR14XX_PINN7_PADAC, PINMUX_OUTEN_RETAIN_HW_CTRL, PINMUX_INPEN_RETAIN_HW_CTRL);
1053  Pinmux_Set_FuncSel(SOC_XWR14XX_PINN7_PADAC, SOC_XWR14XX_PINN7_PADAC_GPIO_1);
1054 
1055  /* GPIO Output: Configure pin N13 as GPIO_2 output */
1056  Pinmux_Set_OverrideCtrl(SOC_XWR14XX_PINN13_PADAZ, PINMUX_OUTEN_RETAIN_HW_CTRL, PINMUX_INPEN_RETAIN_HW_CTRL);
1057  Pinmux_Set_FuncSel(SOC_XWR14XX_PINN13_PADAZ, SOC_XWR14XX_PINN13_PADAZ_GPIO_2);
1058 
1059  /**********************************************************************
1060  * Setup the SW1 switch on the EVM connected to GPIO_1
1061  * - This is used as an input
1062  * - Enable interrupt to be notified on a switch press
1063  **********************************************************************/
1064  GPIO_setConfig (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_1, GPIO_CFG_INPUT | GPIO_CFG_IN_INT_RISING | GPIO_CFG_IN_INT_LOW);
1065  GPIO_setCallback (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_1, MmwDemo_switchPressFxn);
1066  GPIO_enableInt (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_1);
1067 
1068  /**********************************************************************
1069  * Setup the DS3 LED on the EVM connected to GPIO_2
1070  **********************************************************************/
1071  GPIO_setConfig (SOC_XWR14XX_GPIO_2, GPIO_CFG_OUTPUT);
1072 
1073  /* Start the Task: */
1074  while (1)
1075  {
1076  /* Wait for a sensor event */
1077  event = Event_pend(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, Event_Id_NONE,
1078  MMWDEMO_CLI_SENSORSTART_EVT | MMWDEMO_CLI_SENSORSTOP_EVT |
1079  MMWDEMO_CLI_FRAMESTART_EVT | MMWDEMO_BSS_STOP_EVT |
1080  MMWDEMO_KEY_PRESS_EVT | MMWDEMO_DATAPATH_STOP_EVT,
1081  BIOS_WAIT_FOREVER);
1082 
1083  if(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state >= MmwDemo_SensorState_MAX)
1084  {
1085  /* Not expected state */
1086  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1087  }
1088 
1089  /************************************************************************
1090  * Sensor Start Event:
1091  ************************************************************************/
1092  if (event & MMWDEMO_CLI_SENSORSTART_EVT)
1093  {
1094  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.keyPressEvent = 0;
1095  MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state](MmwDemo_SensorEvent_START);
1096  }
1097 
1098  /************************************************************************
1099  * Sensor Start Event:
1100  ************************************************************************/
1101  if (event & MMWDEMO_CLI_FRAMESTART_EVT)
1102  {
1103  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.keyPressEvent = 0;
1104  MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state](MmwDemo_SensorEvent_FRAME_START);
1105  }
1106 
1107  /************************************************************************
1108  * Sensor Stop Event:
1109  ************************************************************************/
1110  if (event & MMWDEMO_CLI_SENSORSTOP_EVT)
1111  {
1112  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.keyPressEvent = 0;
1113  MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state](MmwDemo_SensorEvent_STOP);
1114  }
1115 
1116  /************************************************************************
1117  * Sensor bss Stop Event:
1118  ************************************************************************/
1119  if (event & MMWDEMO_BSS_STOP_EVT)
1120  {
1121  MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state](MmwDemo_SensorEvent_BSS_STOP);
1122  }
1123 
1124  /************************************************************************
1125  * Sensor datapath Stop Event:
1126  ************************************************************************/
1127  if (event & MMWDEMO_DATAPATH_STOP_EVT)
1128  {
1129  MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state](MmwDemo_SensorEvent_DATAPATH_STOP);
1130  }
1131 
1132  /************************************************************************
1133  * Sensor key press Event:
1134  ************************************************************************/
1135  if (event & MMWDEMO_KEY_PRESS_EVT)
1136  {
1137  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.keyPressEvent = 1;
1138  MmwDemo_sensorStateMachine[gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state](MmwDemo_SensorEvent_KEY_PRESS);
1139  }
1140  }
1141 }
1142 
1154 void MmwDemo_notifySensorStart(bool doReconfig)
1155 {
1156  if (doReconfig) {
1157  Event_post (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, MMWDEMO_CLI_SENSORSTART_EVT);
1158  }
1159  else {
1160  Event_post (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, MMWDEMO_CLI_FRAMESTART_EVT);
1161  }
1162 }
1163 
1175 void MmwDemo_notifySensorStop(void)
1176 {
1177  Event_post (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, MMWDEMO_CLI_SENSORSTOP_EVT);
1178 }
1179 
1180 
1190 int32_t MmwDemo_waitSensorStartComplete(void)
1191 {
1192  UInt event;
1193  int32_t retVal;
1194  /* Pend on the START NOTIFY event */
1195  event = Event_pend(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify,
1196  Event_Id_NONE,
1197  MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT|MMWDEMO_START_FAILED_EVT,
1198  BIOS_WAIT_FOREVER);
1199 
1200  /************************************************************************
1201  * DSS event:: START notification
1202  ************************************************************************/
1203  if(event & MMWDEMO_START_COMPLETED_EVT)
1204  {
1205  /* nothing much to do here */
1206  retVal=0;
1207  }
1208  else if(event & MMWDEMO_START_FAILED_EVT)
1209  {
1210  /* nothing much to do here */
1211  retVal = -1;
1212  }
1213  else
1214  {
1215  /* we should block forever till we get the event. If the desired event
1216  didnt happen, then throw an assert */
1217  retVal = -1;
1218  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1219  }
1220  return retVal;
1221 }
1222 
1232 void MmwDemo_waitSensorStopComplete(void)
1233 {
1234  UInt event;
1235  /* Pend on the START NOTIFY event */
1236  event = Event_pend(gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify,
1237  Event_Id_NONE,
1238  MMWDEMO_STOP_COMPLETED_EVT,
1239  BIOS_WAIT_FOREVER);
1240 
1241  /************************************************************************
1242  * STOP notification
1243  ************************************************************************/
1244  if(event & MMWDEMO_STOP_COMPLETED_EVT)
1245  {
1246  /* do nothing */
1247  }
1248  else {
1249  /* we should block forever till we get the event. If the desired event
1250  didnt happen, then throw an assert */
1251  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1252  }
1253 }
1254 
1264 void MmwDemo_notifyBssSensorStop(void)
1265 {
1266  Event_post (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, MMWDEMO_BSS_STOP_EVT);
1267 }
1268 
1278 void MmwDemo_notifyDathPathStop(void)
1279 {
1280  Event_post (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle, MMWDEMO_DATAPATH_STOP_EVT);
1281 }
1282 
1294 int32_t MmwDemo_sensorMgmtInit (void)
1295 {
1296  Error_Block eb;
1297  Task_Params taskParams;
1298 
1299  /* Initialize the session management module: */
1300  memset ((void *)&gMmwSessionMgmtMCB, 0, sizeof(MmwDemo_SensorMgmtMCB));
1301 
1302  /* Setup the event handle used by the sensor management task: */
1303  Error_init(&eb);
1304  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle = Event_create(NULL, &eb);
1305  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle == NULL)
1306  {
1307  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1308  return -1;
1309  }
1310 
1311  Error_init(&eb);
1312  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify = Event_create(NULL, &eb);
1313  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify == NULL)
1314  {
1315  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1316  return -1;
1317  }
1318 
1319 
1320  /* Sensor is in INIT state */
1321  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.state = MmwDemo_SensorState_INIT;
1322 
1323  /* Sensor is not started */
1324  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.isSensorStarted = false;
1325 
1326  /* Launch the Session Management Task: */
1327  Task_Params_init(&taskParams);
1328  gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtTaskHandle = Task_create(MmwDemo_sensorMgmtTask, &taskParams, NULL);
1329  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtTaskHandle == NULL)
1330  {
1331  MmwDemo_debugAssert(0);
1332  return -1;
1333  }
1334  return 0;
1335 }
1336 
1348 int32_t MmwDemo_sensorMgmtDeinit (void)
1349 {
1350  /* Delete the Task: */
1351  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtTaskHandle != NULL)
1352  {
1353  Task_delete (&gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtTaskHandle);
1354  }
1355 
1356  /* Delete the Event: */
1357  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle != NULL)
1358  {
1359  Event_delete (&gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.sensorMgmtEventHandle);
1360  }
1361 
1362  if (gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify != NULL)
1363  {
1364  Event_delete (&gMmwSessionMgmtMCB.eventHandleNotify);
1365  }
1366  return 0;
1367 }
